#summary Phrase-to-dependency converter: guidelines

= Clear phrase-to-dependency converter =

_Clear phrase-to-dependency converter_ takes [http://www.cis.upenn.edu/~treebank/ Penn Treebank style] phrase structure trees as input and gives corresponding dependency trees in [DataFormat Clear format] as output.  The tool allows users to customize their own head-percolation rules.  It currently supports only English, but the support for Chinese is expected sometime soon.

== How to run ==

On the terminal, type the following command.

{{{
Usage: java clear.engine.PhraseToDep -i <input-file> -o <output-file> -h <headrule-file> [-m <dictionary-directory-path> -l <language=en>]
}}}

 * Input file: name of a file containing [http://www.cis.upenn.edu/~treebank/ Penn Treebank style] phrase structure trees.
 * Output file: name of a file containing dependency trees converted from the input file.
 * Headrule file: name of a file containing headrules.
 * Dictionary directory path: path of a direction containing dictionaries for
